html: So low do Jehovah’s people sink when they deny him and he withdraws his Spirit that some resort to the occult for enlightenment—for “doctrine” and for a “testimony.” The spirits of the dead who respond to such unlawful communications are undoubtedly wicked spirits, who, rather than illuminating people, lead them further into realms of darkness. The people’s lack of food—a covenant curse—instead of causing them to turn back to Jehovah and to his covenant, impels them to curse him and their king and to enter the realm of the dead themselves (cf. Leviticus 24:13-16; Ecclesiastes 10:20).
